creator: moller.martin@gmail.com
text:
Content Assist (Ctrl + Space) needed in log4j.properties, in the Eclipse IDE.
To easy and efficiently build a log4j.properties, without constantly checking
up the framework on the internet.

I initially brougt it up to The eclipse foundation but got this reply:

 <daniel_megert@ch.ibm.com> 2011-03-01 04:32:04 EST ---
Sorry, this has nothing to do with Eclipse SDK. Log4J would have to provide
corresponding tooling.


So I am throwing it at you guys ;)
